discourse_list.title: Whats the best way to add timer transactions to EVM?

content.content: At our project we are looking to add timer transactions to EVM, so one could, say, do something 10 years in the future. Essentially you want to call a smart contract at a given date. My question is how to do it in a simple way that would not incur too much performance loss.
